project_descr: Regional Programme on Disaster Risk Reduction in South East Europe and National response to floods and landslides

outputs.output_descr: Improved national and regional capacities in Disaster risk reduction and management

The project will result in Post Disaster Needs Assessment Reports and Local Recovery Strategies for the selected municipalities. Local Recovery Strategies are the most important outcome of this project since they incorporate disaster risk reduction and "build back better" concepts and will provide local authorities with straightforward plan for addressing threats posed by disasters.

document_name: https://info.undp.org/docs/pdc/Documents/BIH/00056925_RDRR Final narrative report to the EC-March 09 to Sept 11 rev.doc
project_title: regional programme on disaster risk reduction
